## SdrMessageHandler class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A DAF message handler plugin that can decode an incoming Selective Disclosure Response into the internal Message representation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SdrMessageHandler extends AbstractMessageHandler 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [AbstractMessageHandler](./daf-message-handler.abstractmessagehandler.md)
